trans-unit.source: Provides data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event that is raised when you click on a selected control or a designer region in a selected control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"> </xref> evento que é gerado quando você clica em um controle selecionado ou em uma região de designer em um controle selecionado.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>é gerado pelo host de designer para determinadas ações em um controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised when you click a selected control or a designer region in a selected control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um evento é gerado quando você clicar em um controle selecionado ou uma região de designer em um controle selecionado na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe fornece um delegado de padrão para manipular o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When you click a selected control or a designer region of a selected control at design time, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs object.
trans-unit.target: Quando você clica em um controle selecionado ou uma região de designer de um controle selecionado em tempo de design, o designer host inicializa um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>de objeto para um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>tipo de evento e, em seguida, define o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>propriedade com um objeto DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates that you clicked a designer region, the default delegate in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class passes the DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objeto indica que você clicou em uma região de designer, o representante padrão no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe passa o objeto DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to process events that are raised when you click a control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Derivando de classes de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>método para processar os eventos que são gerados quando você clica em um controle no host de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to, if any.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A>propriedade representa a região de designer de controle que o evento se aplica, se houver.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A> property represents the location on the design surface that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A>propriedade representa o local na superfície de design que foi clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre eventos e delegados, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified region and location.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"> </xref> classe com a região especificada e o local.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate method uses the DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs constructor to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object for use with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>método delegate usa o construtor DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs para inicializar um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>objeto para uso com um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: When you click a control region at design time, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando você clica em uma região de controle em tempo de design, o designer host inicializa um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>de objeto para um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>tipo de evento e, em seguida, define o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>propriedade com um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The designer region that was clicked; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>.
trans-unit.target: A região designer que foi clicada; usado para inicializar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>

trans-unit.source: The location that was clicked, relative to the upper left corner of the region; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>.
trans-unit.target: O local que foi clicado, em relação ao canto superior esquerdo da região; usado para inicializar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the location within the control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o local dentro do controle que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: The Location property contains the coordinates that identify where you clicked, relative to the upper left corner of the region.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade local contém as coordenadas que identificam em que você clicou, em relação ao canto superior esquerdo da região.

trans-unit.source: The Location property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Location é inicializada, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> identifying the location within the region that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> identifica o local dentro da região em que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a região designer que foi clicada, se houver.

trans-unit.source: The Region property represents the control designer region that was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Region representa a região de designer de controle que foi clicada, se houver.

trans-unit.source: The Region property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Region é inicializada, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> that the click event applies to, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no region was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref> que se aplica o eventos de clique, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se nenhuma região foi clicado.
